data.title: IED Istituto Europeo di Design
data.meta_description: IED, Istituto Europeo di Design, organizes Master Courses, Undegraduate Courses and Summer Courses in Design, Fashion, Visual Arts and Communication
data.text:
31 May 2024 - 25 August 2024 • Barcelona

“ADI Awards 2024. Industrial design and design culture”

This must-see exhibition, which brings together some of the best products designed and marketed over the last two years, will be on show at Disseny Hub Barcelona until 25 August. Includes the presence of IED Barcelona.

09 September 2024 - 14 September 2024 • Multiple

IED Open Days

A calendar of online and in presence appointments to discover all IED Italy and IED Spain educational paths in the areas of Design, Fashion, Visual Arts, Communication and Restoration.

02 August 2024

IED PHD in Design, Arts and Transdiciplinarity

The new PHD in Design, Art and Transdisciplinarity aims to investigate new interpretative paradigms of Design and the Arts through the experimentation of systemic research methodologies, based on multiple connections and hybridities.

31 July 2024

"Designers in Action!": win a Scholarship for Undergraduate courses

Take part in the Designers in Action! competition and win one of the 22 Scholarships for the Undegraduate courses

24 July 2024

IED Turin Graduates Its First Master's Students in Transdisciplinary Design. Mobility

Eight international students completed a thesis in collaboration with the Metropolitan City of Turin and the Links Foundation, aimed at improving regional mobility in Piedmont.

24 July 2024

IED educational model arrives to Portugal

We confirm our interest in the country and we sign a joint venture with CESAP in Porto.

16 July 2024

Climate change, pollution… What will fashion be like in the future?

Through the ATTRACT Future Technologies for Sustainable Fashion programme, four teams of students from IED Barcelona and FabLab Barcelona IAAC designed prototypes of new garments to respond to this challenge.

25 July 2024

We presented Graduate Fashion Show at Feeric Fashion Week 2024

We were involved in different activities showcasing, supporting, and awarding young talents internationally with a Scholarship.

22 July 2024

FRAGILE SURFACE IEDxArtribune

Artribune commissioned us to produce its magazine covers for the second year in a row. Discover the new cover!

21 June 2024

“OJARI” wins third prize in the Verallia Glass Design and Creation Competition

The work of Elizaveta Loseva, a second-year Product Design student at IED Barcelona, is an elegant wine bottle inspired by La Rioja that connects the consumer directly with the origin of the wine.

10 July 2024

Making the forbidden visible through design

In the face of persecution and censorship, design, creativity and critical thinking come together in defence of freedom of expression. Discover three projects by Visual Arts students from IED Barcelona presented on 4 June at the Museu de l’Art Prohibit.

16 July 2024

Climate change, pollution… What will fashion be like in the future?

Through the ATTRACT Future Technologies for Sustainable Fashion programme, four teams of students from IED Barcelona and FabLab Barcelona IAAC designed prototypes of new garments to respond to this challenge.

04 July 2024

170 students of 44 nationalities taking part in the IED Barcelona Summer Courses

The educational offer of the summer programmes includes 10 courses aimed at adults and three for junior students. As a new proposal for this year, all will address the same transversal theme: water from the perspective of design.

09 July 2024

IED at Fashion for Future contest

Eurasian Fashion Week in collaboration with IED - Istituto Europeo di Design, is happy to announce the next edition of Fashion for Future Contest for young designers.

25 July 2024

We presented Graduate Fashion Show at Feeric Fashion Week 2024

We were involved in different activities showcasing, supporting, and awarding young talents internationally with a Scholarship.

27 June 2024

IED Madrid's Fashion Show 2024, a special edition to celebrate the school's 30th anniversary

IED Madrid awards Jaime Naddaf as the best collection emerging from its ateliers during this academic year

05 July 2024

IED Barcelona students design the official T-shirt for the 45th Matagalls-Montserrat Crossing

Second-year Graphic Design students put forward six proposals from which the Gracia Hiking Club, the event organiser, has chosen a winner.

21 June 2024

“OJARI” wins third prize in the Verallia Glass Design and Creation Competition

The work of Elizaveta Loseva, a second-year Product Design student at IED Barcelona, is an elegant wine bottle inspired by La Rioja that connects the consumer directly with the origin of the wine.

18 June 2024

Graduate Fashion Week 2024 in London

IED Milano, Barcelona and Firenze took part at the last Graduate Fashion Week in London. They presented two fashion collections on the runway, selected pieces at the International Fair, and digital portfolios.

21 June 2024

Best Thesis Awards 2024 – IED Barcelona

Vehicles with a positive impact on people and the environment, building personality through fashion, and approaching food culture from a visual arts perspective. These are some of the themes of the final projects that earned these awards.
